articles.title: Cathie Wood Says Inflation Could Fall To 'Zero Or Even Negative' As AI Boom And Trump's Policies Could Push GDP Growth To 7%
articles.summary: Cathie Wood said artificial intelligence and other breakthrough technologies will spark a massive productivity boom that could push U.S. inflation to zero while reshaping economic growth.

articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping career prospects. Discover how it affects job opportunities for young professionals.

articles.title: Artificial Intelligence Communications Are Not Protected By Any Privilege
articles.summary: Discusses how a person's communications with Artificial Intelligence (AI) will not be protected by legal privileges such as attorney-client privilege.

articles.title: OpenAI May Launch Its First AI Chip As Early As 2026
articles.summary: Reports claim that Broadcom and OpenAI are teaming up to develop custom artificial intelligence chips that could launch as soon as next year.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI May Launch Its First AI Chip As Early As 2026
articles.translated_summary: Reports claim that Broadcom and OpenAI are teaming up to develop custom artificial intelligence chips that could launch as soon as next year.

articles.title: Apple sued by authors over use of books in AI training
articles.summary: Technology giant Apple was accused by authors in a lawsuit on Friday of illegally using their copyrighted books to help train its artificial intelligence systems, part of an expanding legal fight over protections for intellectual property in the AI era.
articles.translated_title: Apple sued by authors over use of books in AI training
